bioconda.name: bioconductor-graphite
bioconda.summary: GRAPH Interaction from pathway Topological Environment

biotools.summary: Package able to gather and make easily available the contents of the four major pathway databases. In the field of topological analysis graphite acts as a provider of biological information by reducing the pathway complexity considering the biological meaning of the pathway elements.
